projects.name: La Jaira de Ana
projects.description: In La Jaira de Ana, we were proposed to revolutionize the appreciation of the agricultural sector in the Canary Islands, creating a space that merges culture, education, and sustainability. We chose Nuxt2 for its ability to generate universal applications (SSR), Firebase for real-time data management without efforts, Vuetify to offer a rich and accessible interface, and PWA to ensure an exceptional user experience, both online and offline. This technological approach allowed us to create an interactive portal that not only promotes the importance of local agriculture but also invites active participation through workshops and immersive experiences.

projects.name: DO EL Hierro
projects.description: DO EL Hierro represents a seal of excellence for the wines of our region. With the challenge of highlighting the uniqueness and quality of our wines, we opted for Nuxt2 for a fluid user experience and SEO optimized, Firebase for a secure and scalable database, TailwindCSS for a customized and adaptable design, and PWA for offline accessibility and on mobile devices. This technological combination has allowed us not only to elegantly present the denomination of origin but also to educate our visitors on the rich winemaking heritage of El Hierro.

projects.name: Foro eBC
projects.description: The eBC Forum is the pinnacle of innovation in the ICT sector and emerging technologies in the Canary Islands. We opted for Vue2 for its flexibility and ease of integration, Firebase for a complete backend solution without complications, and PWA to ensure constant and effective access. This technological infrastructure facilitated us to create an interactive space where professionals and companies can explore opportunities, share knowledge, and promote the digital economy in a collaborative and sustainable way.

projects.name: Torino autocasión
projects.description: At Torino Autocasión, we transform the pre-owned vehicle purchasing experience. We used Vue2 and Vuetify for an intuitive and aesthetically appealing interface, Firebase for efficient management of inventories and customer data, and PWA so our users can access our platform at any time and place. This approach allows us to offer exceptional customer service, with specialized advice and post-sale support, highlighting our commitment to quality and trust.

projects.name: Business Evolver
projects.description: Business Evolver is dedicated to empowering organizations towards sustainability. We adopted Vue2, Vuetify, and Firebase to develop a robust and aesthetically advanced platform, complemented with PWA to maximize accessibility. Our technological approach allows us to strategically align businesses with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), promoting business practices that benefit both society and the environment.

projects.name: Wave 2 EW
projects.description: Wave 2 EW is a pioneering project for replacing diesel generators with renewable energy and water desalination solutions. The choice of Vue2, Firebase, Vuetify, and PWA was strategic to develop a platform that facilitates the management and monitoring of large-scale projects, promoting the adoption of renewable energies in isolated communities and contributing to a more sustainable future.

projects.name: +QHuellas
projects.description: +QHuellas redefines veterinary care, putting animal welfare at the forefront. With Vue2, Vuetify, and Firebase, we created a friendly and efficient digital experience, while PWA ensures the availability of our service at any time. This approach allows us to offer modern and compassionate veterinary care, focused on minimizing our pets' stress and improving their quality of life.

projects.name: Frutería Víntage
projects.description: Frutería Víntage is more than a fruit shop; it's a unique shopping experience that blends tradition and modernity. We implemented Vue2, Vuetify, and Firebase to offer an exceptional user experience, with PWA to ensure uninterrupted access. Our platform invites customers to immerse themselves in a journey through local flavors and traditions, strengthening the connection with our agricultural heritage.
